/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and cars.
